casebody.data:
Linda FORD, Appellant,
v.
PAUWELS TRANSFORMERS and Treasurer of Missouri as Custodian of the Second Injury Fund, Respondents. No. ED 107317 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, DIVISION TWO. Filed: May 7, 2019 ATTORNEYS FOR APPELLANT: Jeffrey P. Gault, 222 South Central Avenue, Suite 808, Clayton, MO 63105. ATTORNEYS FOR RESPONDENT: Brad L. McChesney, 10733 Sunset Office Drive, Suite 410, St. Louis, MO 63127, Caroline M. Bean, 815 Olive Street, Suite 200, St. Louis, MO 63101. Before Philip M. Hess, P.J. and Robert G. Dowd, Jr. and Mary K. Hoff, JJ.

ORDER

PER CURIAM.

Linda Ford appeals from two separate final awards of the Missouri Labor and Industrial Relations Commission affirming the Division of Workers' Compensation and awarding Appellant permanent partial disability benefits and denying future medical treatment from Pauwels Transformers in one case while awarding permanent partial disability benefits but denying permanent total disability benefits from the Second Injury Fund in the second case. Finding no error, we affirm.
